content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>Denver Public Works - Traffic Engineering Services (PWTES)</origin>         <pubdate>20141019</pubdate>         <title>Denver Bicycle Facilities</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This data contains the existing and proposed bicycle facilities in the City and County of Denver.</abstract>       <purpose>The purpose of this data is to offer a current inventory of bicycle facilities in the City and County of Denver, as well as the proposed facilities as recommended in Denver Moves (Denver\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds bicycle and pedestrian facility plan). </purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.109635</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.665612</eastbc>         <northbc>39.851116</northbc>         <southbc>39.624131</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>bike</themekey>         <themekey>Denver-Moves</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>transportation</themekey>         <themekey>society</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:   None. Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.
